short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension reverts the github header to its former light color

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring back the original Github header style! This simple extension only adds some styling lines to revert the header back to the way it was, no javascript included.
